segments.text: Good morning . What can I do for you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Christmas Day is coming . I want to buy several postcards to send to my family and friends . Can you recommend me some ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Of course . How about these postcards ? They are specially designed for Christmas .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: These postcards are great . I want to buy a dozen with different pictures .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No problem . You can choose what you like .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: A postcard costs you five yuan . A dozen postcards cost you 60 yuan .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: OK . Here is the money . Thank you very much .
segments.speaker: S2
